text: Alseis lugonis is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. == References == == Sources == * Jaramillo, T., Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. 2004. Alseis lugonis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. == External links == * Alseis in the World Checklist of Rubiaceae Category:Condamineeae Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Alseis lugonis
